text: Unabasomere inkuru ya Nuhu (Nowa) ubwo yabwiraga abantu be ati “Yemwe bantu banjye! Niba kuba mbarimo no kuba mbibutsa amagambo ya Allah bibabereye umutwaro (mumenye ko) Allah ari we niringiye. Ngaho nimuhuze umugambi munishyire hamwe n’ibigirwamana byanyu, kandi imigambi yanyu ntibe rwihishwa, maze mumfatire icyemezo kandi ntimundindirize.”
